game.name: Drift Car Stunt Simulator
game.description:
Driving a racing car can race your heart fast and give your body the much awaited Goosebumps! And here luckily you are going to get a chance to drive different top racing car models that run fast on any track. Would you like to try it out to give your fantasy for speed a real challenge? Join Drift Car Stunt Simulator and be prepared to explore a beautifully-designed driving environment of a big city that is full of wonderful buildings, skyscrapers, vehicles and stunt ramps!

In this brand new racing game, you would love driving a 4x4 stunt car 3D, a speed car SUV and various other popular car models. It will give you an ultimate excitement and thrill when you drive a drift car at a high speed through the beautiful hills and mountains. Grab your seat on your chosen vehicle and get ready to drive hard on 8 unique and stunning racing tracks in your own style! There are multiple free levels that are full of adventure and action in this HTML5 car game.

It is up to you whether you want to make stunt or drive through the lovely streets of a gorgeous city that features many eye-popping views and attractive building structures. Put your driving and stunt performing abilities to the test to enjoy a real and immersive driving experience in this new stunt car simulating game! Find the impossible tracks to perform some insane aerobatic mid-air flips to get a breathtaking adventure! Earn money to customize cars in this no. 1 drift car racing game! Check out more car driving simulators to kill your time with ease here with us on atmegame.com!
